item.title: Build PostgreSQL with debug info
item.description: Add postgres user useradd -m -b /go/ postgres Configure PostgreSQL ./configure --prefix=/go/postgres \ --without-tcl \ --without-gssapi \ --without-pam \ --without-bsd-auth \ --without-ldap \ --without-bonjour \ --without-selinux \ --without-systemd \ --with-uuid=ossp \ --with-libxml \ --with-libxslt \ CFLAGS=' ' Build and install make -j$(nproc) su postgres -c 'make install'
